sourceMeaningMnemonic: The kanji and the radical are the same, so remembering the meaning of this kanji is as simple as making sure you know the radical for <radical>now</radical> first! If you know the radical, you know this kanji means <kanji>now</kanji> as well.
meaningInfo: Make sure you know those radicals, yo!
readingMnemonic: Right <kanji>now</kanji> the <reading>con</reading>dors (<ja>こん</ja>) are in danger! Not next week, not next year, right now! Haven't you heard that deforestation and pollution are killing all of the condors?!
readingInfo: Go outside right now and do something to save the condors. If you don't do something right now there won't be enough time left!
